tech_news.title: Mirelo raises $41M from Index and a16z to solve AI video’s silent problem - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Mirelo, a German startup that is building AI to add synced sound effects to videos, has raised a $41 million seed round led by Index Ventures and Andreessen Horowitz.

tech_news.title: Kernel Graphics Driver Changes Already Begin Lining Up For Linux 6.20~7.0 - Phoronix
tech_news.description: Even before the Linux 6.19 merge window wrapped up this weekend with the Linux 6.19-rc1 release, there was already the first pull request to DRM-Next of the first batch of new material to be queued for Linux 6.19's successor.

tech_news.title: Lara Croft actress Camilla Luddington bids farewell to Tomb Raider, as Alix Wilton Regan teases "we're just getting started" - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Tomb Raider's Lara Croft actress Camilla Luddington has passed her bow and arrows to Alix Wilton Regan with a farewell post to the character.

tech_news.title: French President Emmanuel Macron Is Back on Instagram Celebrating Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, This Time for Winning Game of the Year - IGN
tech_news.description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33's record-breaking performance at last week's The Game Awards has caught the eye of French president Emmanuel Macron, who celebrated the news of its Game of the Year award on Instagram over the weekend.

tech_news.description: According to CAPCOM leaker Dusk Golem, the Resident Evil Code Veronica remake should launch in 2027, with the Zero remake due in 2028.
